name: Sibyl & Ranger vs. the Dark Matter Danger
name_original: Sibyl & Ranger vs. the Dark Matter Danger
description:
After the weaponization of dark matter made Earth temporarily uninhabitable, physicist Dr. Sibyl took cover underground with Ranger, her subterranean robot. Now, she must get back to the surface to see if it can sustain human life again, but she’ll need to cooperate with Ranger if she wants to return above ground in one piece.

Developed over one week as part of the inaugural College Game Jam, with the theme "Connection." Received an Honorable Mention from the judges.

Pixel Menace Team

Programming: Matt (Xenvex)

Art: Luigia (cloudcove)

Sound/Music: Zack (Zackysack)

Narrative: Mercedes (musicworm)
